head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDERSON, JOSEPH ANTHONY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDERSON, JOSEPH ANTHONY

block.p: ANDERSON--Joseph Anthony, died January 14, 2007, of Greenport, NY, formerly of Bridgehampton, NY. Beloved husband of the late Frances Brooke and the late Martha Hartman. Devoted father of Helen Anderson Phinney and her husband, Terry, grandfather of Arthur and Brooke Phinney, brother of Stephen T. Anderson. A memorial service will be held at 1:00 pm February 3rd at St. Ann's Episcopal Church in Bridgehampton, New York.
